author: TEAMtalk
title: Ground News - Liverpool, Chelsea handed massive boost as outstanding Serie A midfielder rejects mega Saudi Pro League offer
text:
Summary by TEAMtalk Liverpool and Chelsea have seemingly been handed a big boost to their hopes of snapping up a top Serie A midfielder after the Inter Milan reportedly star snubbed the chance to head to the Saudi Pro League. Share menu More
